title: MineWeather
author: Sawyer Pollard
excerpt: MineWeather is a Chrome (and Firefox) extension that displays a delightful scene from Minecraft based on the current weather. It has unique images for day, night, and twilight. I'm launching it on Product Hunt because an exciting new update is coming!
text: FreeMineWeather is a Chrome (and Firefox) extension that displays a delightful scene from Minecraft based on the current weather. It has unique images for day, night, and twilight. I'm launching it on Product Hunt because an exciting new update is coming!Launched inChrome Extensions Weather byMineWeather
html:
Free

MineWeather is a Chrome (and Firefox) extension that displays a delightful scene from Minecraft based on the current weather. It has unique images for day, night, and twilight. I'm launching it on Product Hunt because an exciting new update is coming!

Launched in

Chrome Extensions

Weather

by

MineWeather
